column3: For 'send to yourself' transactions, maybe the row-background shading should be tinted a different colour. So it is more visually apparent what transactions leave the wallet?

I think it may be a good idea to just remove send-to-self as a thing. In some cases (eg, CoinJoins), it is indistinguishable from send-to-someone-else + receive-from-someone-else in the same transaction...
@da2ce7 there is the left column that already have a logo to distinguish.\n@luke-jr I think this is a good idea, will try that
@luke-jr an alternative would be to not consider watch-only as "self".
I think https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10007 is superior alternative.\nKeeping open this one until it is clear we will not use it.
This list only the first to-yourself-output. But I think this is okay.
